{"data"=>
    {"id"=>"#{User.first.id}",
     "type"=>"users",
     "attributes"=>
           {"email"=>"user@random.com"},
       "relationships"=>
           {"plants"=>
               {"data"=>
                   [{"id"=>user.plants.first.id,
                   "name"=>"#{user.plants.first.name}",
                   "description"=>"#{user.plants.first.description}"}]}}}}
